## DataStore.findMessages() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findMessages({ sender, receiver, threadId, limit, }: {
        sender?: string;
        receiver?: string;
        threadId?: string;
        limit?: number;
    }): Promise<{
        rowId: string;
        id: string;
        sender: {
            did: string;
        };
        receiver: {
            did: string;
        };
        type: string;
        threadId: string;
        data: string;
        raw: string;
        timestamp: number;
    }[]>;
```
